content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the 'google' command to search for "fun and educational websites" and received a list of results. I then used the 'browse_website' command to visit a website that provides a list of free educational websites for kids, including National Geographic Kids, ABC Mouse, PBS Kids, CoolMath4Kids, and Science Bob, as well as a longer list of 51 educational websites that offer a variety of games, activities, and resources for learning. Additionally, I learned about a website called Mke With Kids that provides information on activities and places to visit in Milwaukee. The website uses cookies for a personalized user experience.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.americanbar.org/groups/labor_law/publications/labor_employment_law_news/spring-2022/ai-in-the-workplace/", "https://hbr.org/2019/04/the-legal-and-ethical-implications-of-using-ai-in-hiring", "https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fsurg.2022.862322/full", "https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2016/10/top-10-ethical-issues-in-artificial-intelligence/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8963864/", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666659620300056", "https://frostbrowntodd.com/the-use-and-legal-ramifications-of-artificial-intelligence-entering-the-workforce/", "https://news.bloomberglaw.com/us-law-week/employers-should-consider-these-risks-when-employees-use-chatgpt"]', type='action_result')]
"""
